response.original_title: Stolen Innocence: India's Untold Story of Human Trafficking
response.overview: Stolen Innocence delves into a hidden world; the untold story of young women captured and forced into a life of sex slavery. Without a voice, without a choice, these girls are violently trafficked into the worlds largest sex ring.  Filmmakers Casey Allred, Chris Davis and Lindsay Daniels compile shocking footage and emotional interviews, uncovering the secret sex trafficking industry throughout India, Nepal and Bangladesh.
response.title: Stolen Innocence: India's Untold Story of Human Trafficking
